name: node-nodejs-basics
description: This repository is the part of nodejs-assignments https://github.com/AlreadyBored/nodejs-assignments

scripts.all: npm run fs:all && npm run cli:all && npm run modules && npm run hash  && npm run streams:all && npm run zip:all && npm run wt && npm run cp
scripts.fs:all: npm run fs:create && npm run fs:copy && npm run fs:rename && npm run fs:delete && npm run fs:list && npm run fs:read
scripts.cli:all: npm run cli:args npm run cli:env
scripts.streams:all: npm run streams:read && npm run streams:write && npm run streams:transform
scripts.zip:all: npm run zip:compress && npm run zip:decompress

author: alreadybored
